positivetext: I was extremely satisfied with my experience. The staff were professional, friendly, and attentive, ensuring my comfort throughout my stay. The room was spacious, clean, and well-maintained, offering a relaxing environment. The hotel's location was ideal, with easy access to attractions, shopping centers, and restaurants. Dining options were diverse and of high quality, and the modern amenities, including fast Wi-Fi and a well-equipped gym, added to the overall comfort. Considering the service, comfort, and location, Sunset Hotel offered great value for money, and I would highly recommend it.
title: My stay at Sunset Hotel in Jeddah was exceptional, with excellent service, comfort, and value for mo

negativetext: I don't remember having any negative feelings about anything during our stay.

negativetext: Nothing. This place is an oasis
positivetext: Everything is great. From food to villa, to view 360 degrees.
title: Exquisite

positivetext:
You won’t believe what you experience here!

This isn’t just a hotel—it’s an unforgettable experience. The staff? They’re not just friendly; they feel like family. They truly care about every little detail, making sure you feel at home.

The facilities are beyond imagination! They provide special clothes for nighttime desert outings, where you can sit by a fire and gaze at the stars. The vibe, the views, the activities—it’s the perfect blend of luxury and raw nature.

The level of detail is insane! Even the antennas are hidden inside crafted stones so you never feel out of touch with nature. They’ve seamlessly blended technology, luxury, and the desert environment, so you have all the comforts without anything feeling artificial.

And let’s talk about the pools—unreal! The infinity pool is a must-see (check the pictures online!), plus each villa has its own heated private pool—even when the desert gets cold.

Our driver (his name was tricky to remember!) became like family during our stay. And honestly? I miss the staff! That’s how much they care.

The location is breathtaking, just 5 minutes from Maya Mirror. Yes, it’s far from the city, but that’s the whole point—to escape, unwind, and immerse yourself in this dreamlike oasis.

If you’re considering it, don’t hesitate. This isn’t just a hotel—it’s a once-in-a-lifetime experience.

✨ 10/10, highly recommend! ✨
title: Unknown

positivetext: Everything was amazing. Staff was really nice, the views were breathtaking, and the villa was huge and well-organized.
title: Recommended ♥︎

negativetext: There was nothing we didn't like.
positivetext: It was so neat and clean; we could feel the calmness of nature. The behavior of the staff and housekeeping was impeccable every time we left the room.
title: One of their managers, Zehra, was so nice and well-behaved, and took personal care of us.

positivetext:
The Resort is simply put amazing. Everything about it is just perfect, from the location, the service, the team, the hygiene, the hospitality. I am traveling a lot and it was the first time i was treated like this me and my family. 
But from all the people working there me and my family want to thank from the bottom of our hearts Mr. Nikos and Miss Evi for elevating our experience in a complete different level. Those were very special holidays for my family and they both showed how great and generous people they are. But also all the team working in this resort is just magnificent. I recommend this place to everyone visiting AlUla. Once again thanks all for the unforgettable holidays and the warm welcoming.
title: Memories that will never be forgotten

positivetext: Banyan tree is an earthly heaven. Everything was perfect. The staff is amazing, especially Suhad.

Because it usually takes 15/20 min for it to arrive, we used to request it in advance for a specific time so this way our plans don't get messy, however 3 or 4 times our request was not met, and it did impact our plan
positivetext: The hotel is simply amazing, the landscape is phenomenal, the room is comfortable with an amazing view, and the staff is attentive to our needs. Undoubtedly one of the best experiences of my life.
title: The hotel is simply amazing, the landscape is phenomenal and the room is comfortable

negativetext: There’s absolutely nothing that I didn’t like
positivetext: Everything in this hotel was simply amazing! The breakfast menu was diversified, the stuff always available and willing to help me .
title: Top notch service , top notch facilities

positivetext: From service, ambiance, attention to detail, tentative staff, the smiles, the little things and grand things, they simply genuinely care.
title: Is this to be my new home away from home?!?

positivetext:
My husband and I recently stayed at Banyan Tree AlUla for our honeymoon, and it was the most beautiful hotel we've ever experienced. From the warm welcome at reception, where we received lovely bracelets, to the stunning views of the canyons from our room, every moment felt special.
The amenities were fantastic. The private pool at our villa was great for relaxing, and the rock pool provided an even more unique experience. One of the highlights was stargazing directly from our villa; the engineers kindly turned off the surrounding lights so we could fully enjoy the starry sky. Riding bicycles delivered to our room under the stars was a truly magical experience we’ll never forget.
Breakfast at Harrat restaurant was excellent, offering a wide range of delicious options to start our day. The entire stay was filled with thoughtful touches that made our honeymoon unforgettable.
title: Simply amazing

positivetext: breakfast very good
title: Unknown

positivetext: The property was everything I was expecting. The details throughout the resort were truly amazing. From the main reception where you’re greeted by friendly staff. We stayed in a two bedroom villa and it was nothing short of beautiful. The peaceful surroundings that blends perfectly within the landscape can only be described as magnificent. The thoughtful amenities inside the villa, from how each room had its own lighting and climate control, to the soaking tub bath soap were not overlooked. The outside plunging pool was cleaned daily. The restaurants and room service menu were also lovely.
title: I couldn’t imagine a better place to stay while visiting Al Ula.

positivetext: The Staff is very friendly and professional.
title: Amazing Place
